text:
UPDATE (August 14, 2018): Looks like Essence Lash Princess Mascara strikes again with another beauty convert. Reddit user Crow_Rufio_Crow recently posted a lash selfie on Reddit's Makeup Addiction forum with one eye with naked lashes and one eye wearing the $5 drugstore mascara — with unbelievably dramatic results. Seriously, it looks like she's got lash extensions on. She wrote, "Been waiting for what seems like forever to open my new tube of mascara. Finally jumped on the Essence lash princess train and HOLY SHIT."

Reddit: Crow_Rufio_Crow

Yeah, I'd say.

Last we wrote about this mascara about a year ago, another Reddit user had also posted her dramatic before and after shot of using this mascara with equally impressive results. For just $5 it's only a matter of time before this mascara climbs the ranks of Holy Grail status for beauty aficionados.

Just so you don't get it twisted, there are few variations of the Essence Lash Princess mascara, and Crow_Rufio_Crow makes note that this one she used is in the peachy pink tube — the Lash Princess Volume Mascara. There's also the Lash Princess Sculpted Volume Mascara in a purple tube, and the Lash Princess False Lash Effect Mascara in the green tube.

User BeachWhy says, "The BEST ONE! I've tried the other two as well, they're not as good" and Crow_Rufio_Crow responds "Yes! I loved the false lash, green tube , but this just blows it out of the water."

So there you have it — if you're going to eenie-meenie-minie-mo this one, go for the peach. Then again, they're all $5 so, it's not like you couldn't just easily build a mascara wardrobe of all three.

This post originally appeared on October 9, 2017:

Finding a good mascara, is easier said than done — you have to kiss a few metaphorical mascara frogs before you find a volume-boosting and lengthening mascara Prince Charming, if you will. But one Redditor may have just found the crown princess of all mascaras — and it’s under $5.

Redditor EllieDaisyLouise took to the Makeup Addiction thread — site of so many royally good beauty discoveries — to share a truly unbelievable mascara find you can scoop up at the drugstore: Essence Lash Princess False Lash Effect Mascara.
title: Essence $5 Drugstore Mascara Is Better Than More Expensive Options

meta_data.author: Condé Nast
meta_data.description: One Redditor discovered the ultimate drugstore mascara that delivers results worthy of royalty — or a mascara ad.

og.title: Holy Shit, a $5 Mascara Did This to Someone's Lashes

twitter.title: Holy Shit, a $5 Mascara Did This to Someone's Lashes
